name: Stretch B4U Race
description:
Please enjoy this sketch of a networked multiplayer 3D platforming action racing playground with collectathon and tag elements. This is best played with a game controller and a few friends. 

Troubleshooting:

If you press "Join Game" and nothing happens it's because your computer is missing the libraries needed for multiplyer/networking to work. Look in the folder for VC_redist.x86.exe (32 bit windows) or VC_redist.x64.exe (64 bit windows) and click to install depending on your OS. Alternatively you can find those same files here https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/downloads/ in the section "Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2019". Once you've installed try running the game again and you should be able to join!

Credits:

  • Jo Adams - Gameplay & Networking (@duplicatedframe)
  • Raphael Azcueta - Gameplay & Art (@LUNARSIGNALS)
  • Anthony Tesija - Networking & Art (@AntonTesh)

bu·oy /ˈbo͞oē,boi/

noun

  1.  an anchored float serving as a navigation mark, to show reefs or other hazards, or for mooring.
